Package com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler

Provides all the implementations of Zeidon DB handlers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DbHandler
    The interface between Zeidon OE and the databases.
    JdbcDomainTranslator
    This interface is used by the JdbcHandler to convert attribute values to values that can be stored in a JDBC database.
    PessimisticLockingHandler
    Specifies the interface for locking OIs using pessimistic locking.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSqlHandler  
    AccessJdbcTranslator
    JDBC translator for MS Access DBs.
    JdbcHandler
    A DB handler for JDBC.
    JdbcHandlerUtils
    Some helper functions for loading and setting up JdbcHandlers.
    JdbcMutableConfiguration Deprecated
    MysqlJdbcHandler
    JDBC handler for mysql that uses "lock table" to lock the genkey table.
    PessimisticLockingViaDb
    Handles pessimistic View locking by writing records to the DB to lock OIs.
    SqliteJdbcHandler
    JDBC handler for mysql that uses "lock table" to lock the genkey table.
    SqliteJdbcTranslator
    JDBC translator for Sqlite.
    StandardJdbcTranslator
    The standard JDBC domain translator.
    TestSqlHandler  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractSqlHandler.SqlCommand  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GenkeyLockException
    This exception is returned by the GenKey handler if it can't acquire the GENKEY lock during an activate.

Package com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler Description

Provides all the implementations of Zeidon DB handlers. Applications would only use these classes if they want to implement their own DB handler.
